ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast!
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.

ocean.question: I'm a big, gray mammal that loves to swim. People sometimes see me jump out of the water! What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm bigger than a dolphin.
🦷 Some of my kind have teeth, others do not.
🎶 I sing songs in the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful animal that lives in warm waters and builds reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I help build underwater structures.
🐠 I come in many bright colors.
🏡 Many other fish live near me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and can squirt ink to get away from danger. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can change colors to blend in.
🦑 I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a very large fish with cartilage instead of bones and many sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am known to be a predator.
💪 Some people are very afraid of me.
🌊 You can find me in all oceans.

ocean.question: I am a large floating mass of ice. Where am I most likely to be found?

hints.text: 🥶 I am very, very cold.
🐻‍❄️ Polar bears sometimes live on me.
🧊 I am made of frozen water.

ocean.question: I am the name for a huge wave often caused by an earthquake under the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be very destructive.
🚨 People often get warnings about me.
🌎 I can travel across entire oceans.

ocean.question: I am a current in the Atlantic Ocean that brings warm water from the Gulf of Mexico to Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I help keep Europe warmer than it would otherwise be.
🇺🇸 I start near Florida.
🌎 I am a powerful, fast-moving flow of water.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean, located in the western Pacific Ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏞️ The pressure down there is immense.
🧭 I'm shaped like a crescent.
🌊 Very few people have ever been to me.

ocean.question: I am a process where some sea creatures produce their own light. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I help creatures see in the dark.
✨ It's a chemical reaction that creates light.
🔦 Some fish use me to attract prey.

plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I help you breathe, but have no lungs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I'm often tall and green.
☀️ I need sunlight to grow.
🏡 You might find me in a forest or a garden.

plant.question: I'm a home for seeds, and sometimes I'm pretty. I grow on a plant, but I'm not a leaf. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 Bees and butterflies love me.
🌈 I come in many different colors.
🌿 I turn into a fruit sometimes.

plant.question: I'm long and green, and grow on a vine. I'm a popular snack, especially in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I'm crunchy and refreshing.
🥪 I'm often pickled in a jar.
🥗 I make a good side dish with sandwiches.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes thorns. I often smell sweet and come in many colors. People give me as gifts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I'm often used in bouquets.
💐 Some people think I'm a symbol of love.
🪴 I can grow in a garden or in a pot.

plant.question: I am a grain that grows in fields. I can be made into bread, pasta, and cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am a staple food in many countries.
🍞 I am often ground into flour.
🚜 Farmers grow me.

plant.question: I am a large, round fruit with a thick green rind and sweet, juicy red or pink flesh. I'm perfect for a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am mostly water.
🫘 I often have black seeds inside.
🧺 People often have me at picnics.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows underground. I have a long, orange root that is good for your eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits love to eat me.
💪 I am a good source of Vitamin A.
🍽️ You can eat me raw or cooked.

plant.question: I'm a type of tree that produces a sweet, golden liquid. This liquid is often drizzled on pancakes or waffles. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I am often associated with Canada.
💧 The liquid is collected by tapping the tree.
🥞 The liquid is boiled down to make a syrup.

plant.question: I am a plant whose leaves are used to make a popular hot drink. I grow in warm, rainy climates. What am I?

hints.text: 🍵 My drink comes in many different flavors.
🌎 I am grown in places like China and India.
😴 Some types of me can help you relax.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant with tendrils. My fruit is dried and used as a spice, and I can make you sneeze. What am I?

hints.text: 🌶️ I come in black, white, green, and pink.
🧂 I am often used to season food.
👃 Some people are allergic to me.
